item.title: Static Websites + JAMstack = <3
item.description: I’m sure that by now you’ve heard about how static websites are the best thing since sliced bread. If you’re the type to stay on top of the latest, then you’ve also heard about Smashing Magazine ditching WordPress and moving to a JAMstack (probably how you ended up here). JAMstack stands for JavaScript, APIs, & Markup; it’s an approach to building websites that allows you to have all the web performance and security benefits of a static website along with the dynamic capabilities of a database-driven CMS.
